author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Displays the contents of the specified remote file located in the War Room.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-get-external-file

commands.description: Searches for a string in a remote file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-search-external-file

commands.description: Updates the instance context with the specified list name and list items, and then overrides the path of the remote file with the internal list.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update

commands.description: Updates internal list data with the contents of a remote file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update-from-external-file

commands.description: Deletes a file from a remote server.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-delete-external-file

commands.description: Displays internal list data in the War Room.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-print-internal-list

commands.description: Dumps (copies) instance context to either the incident context or a file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-dump-internal-list

commands.description: Search for a string in internal list.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-search-internal-list

commands.description: Compares internal list and external file contents.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-compare

commands.description: Gets metadata for an external file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-get-external-file-metadata

commands.description: Updates the instance context with the specified list name and list items.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update-internal-list

commands.description: Updates a remote file with the contents of an internal list.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update-external-file

integration.description: Deprecated. Use the Generic Export Indicators Service integration instead. This integration is still supported however, for customers with over 1000 Firewalls.
integration.name: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS EDL Management (Deprecated)

playbook.description:
Configures an external dynamic list in PAN-OS.
In the event that the file exists on the web server, it will sync it to demisto. Then it will create an EDL object and a matching rule.
playbook.name: PAN-OS EDL Setup v3

playbook.description: This playbook parses a CSV file with IOCs and blocks them using Palo Alto Networks External Dynamic Lists.
playbook.name: Block IOCs from CSV - External Dynamic List

playbook.description:
This playbook blocks IP addresses and URLs using Palo Alto Networks Panorama or Firewall External Dynamic Lists.
It checks if the EDL configuration is in place with the 'PAN-OS EDL Setup' sub-playbook (otherwise the list will be configured), and adds the inputted IPs and URLs to the relevant lists.
playbook.name: PAN-OS - Block IP and URL - External Dynamic List v2

playbook.description:
This playbook blocks Domains using Palo Alto Networks Panorama or Firewall External Dynamic Lists.
It checks if the EDL configuration is in place with the 'PAN-OS EDL Setup v3' sub-playbook
(otherwise the list will be configured), and adds the input Domains to the relevant lists.
playbook.name: PAN-OS - Block Domain - External Dynamic List

description: This integration enables you to manage and edit files located on a remote web server via SSH using integration context as Single Source of Truth.

integrations.name: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS EDL Management (Deprecated)

name: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS EDL Management
